O

onError(Consumer<Exception>) - Method in class com.chaining.Guard
provide a Consumer to be invoked when an Exception is thrown, this function will end the current functions chain, if you need to continue the chain with another operations, you can use Guard.onErrorReturn(Function) or Guard.onErrorReturnItem(Object)

onErrorReturn(Function<Throwable, T>) - Method in class com.chaining.Guard
provide a Function that will return a fallback item if the Callable that was passed to this Guard crashed
onErrorReturnForCrashingGuardThenReturnTheValue() - Method in class com.chaining.GuardTest
